name: Believe/Blessed Bracelet
description:
Believe that you can, and you will. You are blessed.

Choose from one of our two designs or personalize this beautiful bracelet with your own word, mantra or quote.

Choose  custom and include your personalization at checkout.
Bracelets are made in a 7 inch average size but can come in smaller/ larger widths upon request.

name: The force is strong with this one... Bracelet
description:
Will you choose the dark side, or the power of The Force??

1inch sterling silver personalized tag on waxed cotton cord.
Choose from 3 different sizes: 6inch for 5 to 7 year olds
                                               7inch for 7 to 9 year olds
                                               8inch for 9 and up
Sizing is approximate and bracelets are adjustable. 
You may also order this bracelet with your own sentiment/ quote. Choose the Custom option and add instructions at checkout.

name: I Rock! Necklace
description:
Show your Little Dude just how awesome he is!

Simple sterling silver dog tag on 16" black waxed cotton cord.

May also be personalized with your own phrase or sentiment. Please select "custom" and add your instructions at checkout.

name: Branch Out Necklace
description:
The roots of a family tree begin with a single branch...

Beautiful 18 " sterling silver necklace with 2 inch extender features either wire- wrapped labradorite or amethyst gemstones. This item may be personalized as shown with words (4 letters or less) or with initials as well.

If custom please specify details in the instructions section at checkout.
